title: Massive lag/fps drops since urf was releases
body: Hi all! Has anyone else been experiencing massive drops in Fps or ping spikes since urf was released? It is making the game really hard to play and have been looking for a fix. I've already tried repairing the client and lowering the graphics but its not helping.

replies.body: Yeah i had that issue only on URF in huge team fights. There'd be so much happening cos everyone's just spamming skills that my fps drops to 1.. legit LOL. For me, i lowered all my graphics cards settings and in-game league settings and it was back to normal?
